hero.title: Welcome to Group Toumbe Manning SARL
hero.subtitle: A dynamic player in Guinea's mining sector
hero.description: We contribute to the responsible exploitation of natural resources while supporting local economic development.

intro.title: Responsible Mining
intro.description: Group Toumbe Manning SARL is engaged in the exploration, exploitation, and marketing of strategic mineral resources in Guinea, with a focus on bauxite, gold, and iron.

cta.title: Interested in Collaboration?
cta.description: Discover how we can work together to create shared value.

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description: Founded in Guinea, Group Toumbe Manning SARL is a mining company engaged in the exploration, exploitation, and marketing of strategic mineral resources.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To exploit natural resources responsibly and sustainably, serving Guinea's economic and social progress.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a regional leader in the mining sector, recognized for our operational excellence, environmental commitment, and positive contribution to local communities.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Since our founding, we have experienced steady growth based on solid principles.

team.title: Our Leadership Team
team.description: Experienced professionals guide our company toward excellence.

intro.title: Our Areas of Expertise
intro.description: Group Toumbe Manning SARL operates throughout the mining value chain, from prospecting to exploitation and export.

intro.title: Current Projects
intro.description: Discover our current and future projects for mining development in Guinea.

intro.title: Our Impact in Guinea
intro.description: We are proud to actively contribute to Guinea's economic and social development through our various initiatives.

community.title: Community Projects
community.description: We actively support the development of local communities through various projects.

environment.title: Environmental Initiatives
environment.description: Our commitment to minimizing our environmental impact and contributing to environmental preservation.

intro.title: Our Presence in Guinea
intro.description: Group Toumbe Manning SARL is present in several strategic regions of Guinea, with its headquarters in Conakry and operating sites in the country's main mining areas.

intro.title: A question? A partnership opportunity?
intro.description: We are at your disposal to answer all your questions and discuss potential collaborations.

form.name: Name

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
